projects.title: Juan-on-Juan
projects.tagline: I designed a website for an sports magazine. →
projects.tldr: Our fictional client was an online publication exploring life and culture through thematic , visually-oriented international coverage and commentary. They were part of a large publishing organization and they were an small team writing about several topics, focusing on releasing stories daily (about 4 or 6) and one long form weekly story.
